name: Game Off 2018 - Space Defenders
description:
Space Defenders

Space Defenders is an hybrid between a Tower Defense game and Space Invaders. We created art inspired by Space Invaders, used the main gameplay with a plane shooting aliens and combined it with towers you can place around the map.

Have fun trying to get through the 10 waves that will try to ambush your village!

Be careful, cannons only last during one wave!

It is also our first game jam ever and it was a very fun process.

Here is the source code: https://github.com/Cydonia7/game-off-2018
